Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'Why don't we shape the world in... Our image.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: She's blushing beyond belief. While nodding she hides her face behind her cape. I never realized how cute she is until now.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: She peeks one eye out from behind her cape as she nods.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'My bellybutton... Is actually a black hole. I can erase the world with it if you wish.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I take a deep breath and concentrate on my bellybutton. And before my eyes it begins to expand.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Longer and wider it becomes, consuming all around me. Until soon there is nothing left except for my beloved and I.

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'Wow no man has ever destroyed the world for me before. I think... I love you.'

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: 'Now we can shape this world how we see fit!'
